title: Education in the Criminal Justice System
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Education in the Criminal Justice System;  Authorizing the Department of Corrections to award gain time for an inmate who completes specified education programs; revising the purpose of the Florida Virtual School to provide for the development and delivery of blended learning; requiring the Florida Virtual School to establish the Florida Virtual School Justice Education Program, beginning with a specified school year; requiring the Department of Education, with assistance from specified entities, to select a common student assessment instrument and protocol for measuring student learning gains and progression, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Criminal Justice; Appropriations Committee on Criminal and Civil Justice; Fiscal Policy
